content: autumn rose gloves is a simple fingerless glove pattern that uses one strand of fingering weight yarn held with one strand of silk-mohair yarn or other lace-weight yarn it s perfect for using up your leftover yarns after finishing a mohair sweater or a pair of socks the gloves have a double-folded hem and are finished with an i-cord edge increases for the thumb are done on the side seam for a clean and polished look materials 50g* fingering weight yarn sample knit in sandnes garn sunday #4236 25g* silk mohair or other lace-weight yarn sample knit in knitting for olive soft silk mohair in bordeaux 3 00mm us 2 5 double pointed needles long circular needles for magic loop or 9-inch circular needles stitch markers if desired tapestry needle for finishing *note that i used 40g of fingering weight yarn and 15g of silk mohair for the sample gloves gauge 28 stitches per 4 inches 10 cm row gauge may vary and instructions for length will be given in inches and cm size one size adult medium send me a tip at https //ko-fi com/dotcardigan if you enjoyed my patterns and want to say thanks
